Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Pd_mastoparan PDD-A (Lys-rich; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; XXA; Derivatives)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 7.5 uM) and B. subtilis (MIC 11.8 uM). Also active against S. aureus (similar to B. subtilis) and P. aeruginosa (MIC 50-150 uM).Toxicity:  not hemo.lytic HC50 >100 uM.Structure:  The peptide adopts a helical conformation in 30% TFE or higher concentrations of SDS.  Updated 10/30/2010; Jan2017; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Cerovský V, Slaninová J, Fucík V, Hulacová H, Borovicková L, Jezek R, Bednárová L2008
Literature Information.Title: New potent antimicrobial peptides from the venom of Polistinae wasps and their analogs
